title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg and cheese mixture.
